name: Powershell LocalAccount Manipulation
description:
Adversaries may manipulate accounts to maintain access to victim systems.
Account manipulation may consist of any action that preserves adversary access to a compromised account, such as modifying credentials or permission groups
query: powershell.file.script_block_text:(/.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee]\-[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll][Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr].*/ OR /.*[Ee][Nn][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee]\-[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll][Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr].*/ OR /.*[Gg][Ee][Tt]\-[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll][Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr].*/ OR /.*[Ss][Ee][Tt]\-[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll][Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr].*/ OR /.*[Nn][Ee][Ww]\-[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll][Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr].*/ OR /.*[Rr][Ee][Nn][Aa][Mm][Ee]\-[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll][Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr].*/ OR /.*[Rr][Ee][Mm][Oo][Vv][Ee]\-[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll][Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr].*/)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`powershell.file.script_block_text:(*Disable\-LocalUser* OR *Enable\-LocalUser* OR *Get\-LocalUser* OR *Set\-LocalUser* OR *New\-LocalUser* OR *Rename\-LocalUser* OR *Remove\-LocalUser*)`
